metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25020 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The BPF subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.17 mishandles situations with a long jump over an instruction sequence where inner instructions require substantial expansions into multiple BPF instructions, leading to an overflow. This affects kernel/bpf/core.c and net/core/filter.c.
